verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

אָ֭מְנָם <S%H551><s%> [it is] so of a truth יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> is so וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how יִּצְדַּ֖ק <S%H6663><s%> be just אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> but how should man עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> before אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> God

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יַ֭חְפֹּץ <S%H2654><s%> If he will לָרִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> contend עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַ֝עֲנֶ֗נּוּ <S%H6030><s%> with him he cannot answer אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> him one מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> in אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> of a thousand

חֲכַ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> [He is] wise לֵ֭בָב <S%H3824><s%> in heart וְאַמִּ֣יץ <S%H533><s%> and mighty כֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> in strength מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הִקְשָׁ֥ה <S%H7185><s%> who hath hardened אֵ֝לָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּשְׁלָֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> [himself] against him and hath prospered

הַמַּעְתִּ֣יק <S%H6275><s%> Which removeth הָ֭רִים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֑עוּ <S%H3045><s%> and they know אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> not When הֲפָכָ֣ם <S%H2015><s%> not which overturneth בְּאַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> them in his anger

הַמַּרְגִּ֣יז <S%H7264><s%> Which shaketh אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth מִמְּקוֹמָ֑הּ <S%H4725><s%> out of her place וְ֝עַמּוּדֶ֗יהָ <S%H5982><s%> and the pillars יִתְפַלָּצֽוּן׃ <S%H6426><s%> thereof tremble

הָאֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Which commandeth לַ֭חֶרֶס <S%H2775><s%> the sun וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִזְרָ֑ח <S%H2224><s%> and it riseth וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> upon כּוֹכָבִ֣ים <S%H3556><s%> the stars יַחְתֹּֽם׃ <S%H2856><s%> not and sealeth up

נֹטֶ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> Which alone spreadeth out שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone וְ֝דוֹרֵ֗ךְ <S%H1869><s%> and treadeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בָּ֥מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> upon the waves יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

עֹֽשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Which maketh עָ֭שׁ <S%H5906><s%> Arcturus כְּסִ֥יל <S%H3685><s%> Orion וְכִימָ֗ה <S%H3598><s%> and Pleiades וְחַדְרֵ֥י <S%H2315><s%> and the chambers תֵמָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> of the south

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Which doeth גְ֭דֹלוֹת <S%H1419><s%> great things עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> past חֵ֑קֶר <S%H2714><s%> finding out וְנִפְלָא֗וֹת <S%H6381><s%> yea and wonders עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> without number

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> behold יַעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> Lo he goeth עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> by me and I see וְ֝יַחֲלֹ֗ף <S%H2498><s%> [him] not he passeth on וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> also but I perceive לֽוֹ׃

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> behold יַ֭חְתֹּף <S%H2862><s%> Behold he taketh away מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יְשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> who can hinder מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> him? who will say אֵ֝לָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto him What doest

אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> [If] God לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> will not withdraw אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> his anger [תַּחַתֹו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֥יו <S%H8478><s%> Thahash ק) שָׁ֝חֲח֗וּ <S%H7817><s%> do stoop עֹ֣זְרֵי <S%H5826><s%> helpers רָֽהַב׃ <S%H7293><s%> the proud

אַ֭ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> can אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑נּוּ <S%H6030><s%> How much less shall I answer אֶבְחֲרָ֖ה <S%H977><s%> him [and] choose out דְבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> my words עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> before

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though צָ֭דַקְתִּי <S%H6663><s%> Whom though I were righteous לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶעֱנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> [yet] would I not answer לִ֝מְשֹׁפְטִ֗י <S%H8199><s%> to my judge אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <S%H2603><s%> [but] I would make supplication

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> If I had called וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> and he had answered לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַ֝אֲמִ֗ין <S%H539><s%> me [yet] would I not believe כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַאֲזִ֥ין <S%H238><s%> that he had hearkened קוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> unto my voice

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> me בִּשְׂעָרָ֥ה <S%H8183><s%> me with a tempest יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <S%H7779><s%> For he breaketh וְהִרְבָּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> and multiplieth פְצָעַ֣י <S%H6482><s%> my wounds חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> without cause

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> He will not יִ֭תְּנֵנִי <S%H5414><s%> He will not suffer הָשֵׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> me to take רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> my breath כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> But יַ֝שְׂבִּעַ֗נִי <S%H7646><s%> but filleth מַמְּרֹרִֽים׃ <S%H4472><s%> me with bitterness

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לְכֹ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> If [I speak] of strength אַמִּ֣יץ <S%H533><s%> lo [he is] strong הִנֵּ֑ה <S%H2009><s%> behold וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לְ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> and if of judgment מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יוֹעִידֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3259><s%> who shall set

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though אֶ֭צְדָּק <S%H6663><s%> If I justify פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> myself mine own mouth יַרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H7561><s%> shall condemn תָּֽם־ <S%H8535><s%> me [if I say] I [am] perfect אָ֝֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I וַֽיַּעְקְשֵֽׁנִי׃ <S%H6140><s%> it shall also prove me perverse

תָּֽם־ <S%H8535><s%> [Though] I [were] perfect אָ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֵדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> [yet] would I not know נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul אֶמְאַ֥ס <S%H3988><s%> I would despise חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> my life

אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> This [is] one הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָמַ֑רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> [thing] therefore I said תָּ֥ם <S%H8535><s%> the perfect וְ֝רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He מְכַלֶּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> [it] He destroyeth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שׁ֭וֹט <S%H7752><s%> If the scourge יָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> slay פִּתְאֹ֑ם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly לְמַסַּ֖ת <S%H4531><s%> at the trial נְקִיִּ֣ם <S%H5355><s%> of the innocent יִלְעָֽג׃ <S%H3932><s%> he will laugh

אֶ֤רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> The earth נִתְּנָ֬ה <S%H5414><s%> is given בְֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the faces שֹׁפְטֶ֥יהָ <S%H8199><s%> of the judges יְכַסֶּ֑ה <S%H3680><s%> he covereth אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> before אֵפ֣וֹא <S%H645><s%> thereof if not where מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> who הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְיָמַ֣י <S%H3117><s%> Now my days קַ֭לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> are swifter מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> than רָ֑ץ <S%H7323><s%> than a post בָּֽ֝רְח֗וּ <S%H1272><s%> they flee away לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> they see טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> no good

חָ֭לְפוּ <S%H2498><s%> They are passed away עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> as אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> ships אֵבֶ֑ה <S%H16><s%> the swift כְּ֝נֶ֗שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> as the eagle יָט֥וּשׂ <S%H2907><s%> [that] hasteth עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> to the prey

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though אָ֭מְרִי <S%H559><s%> If I say אֶשְׁכְּחָ֣ה <S%H7911><s%> I will forget שִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> my complaint אֶעֶזְבָ֖ה <S%H5800><s%> I will leave off פָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> my heaviness וְאַבְלִֽיגָה׃ <S%H1082><s%> and comfort

יָגֹ֥רְתִּי <S%H3025><s%> I am afraid כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עַצְּבֹתָ֑י <S%H6094><s%> of all my sorrows יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תְנַקֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H5352><s%> that thou wilt not hold me innocent
אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I אֶרְשָׁ֑ע <S%H7561><s%> [If] I be wicked לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> then הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> altogether אִיגָֽע׃ <S%H3021><s%> why then labour

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If הִתְרָחַ֥צְתִּי <S%H7364><s%> If I wash [בְמֹו כ] (בְמֵי־ שָׁ֑לֶג <S%H4325><s%> waste ק) וַ֝הֲזִכּ֗וֹתִי <S%H2141><s%> so clean בְּבֹ֣ר <S%H1253><s%> lye כַּפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> and make my hands

אָ֭ז <S%H227><s%> Yet בַּשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> me in the ditch תִּטְבְּלֵ֑נִי <S%H2881><s%> shalt thou plunge וְ֝תִֽעֲב֗וּנִי <S%H8581><s%> shall abhor שַׂלְמוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8008><s%> and mine own clothes כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For [he is] not a man כָּמֹ֣נִי <S%H3644><s%> I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑נּוּ <S%H6030><s%> as I [am that] I should answer נָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> him [and] we should come יַ֝חְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> together בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> in judgment

לֹ֣א <S%H3863><s%> if יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> Neither is בֵּינֵ֣ינוּ <S%H996><s%> between מוֹכִ֑יחַ <S%H3198><s%> there any daysman יָשֵׁ֖ת <S%H7896><s%> betwixt us [that] might lay יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שְׁנֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H8147><s%> upon us both
יָסֵ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> away מֵעָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁבְט֑וֹ <S%H7626><s%> his rod וְ֝אֵמָת֗וֹ <S%H367><s%> from me and let not his fear אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <S%H1204><s%> terrify

אַֽ֭דַבְּרָה <S%H1696><s%> [Then] would I speak וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not אִירָאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3372><s%> and not fear כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> like אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against
